title: Ride On
creator_credit: John La Pointe and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: A film on bicycle safety which begins with a comic history of the development of both the wheel and the bicycle. Six basic safety rules are stressed. Two points of difference beween Australia and Canada are that Australians ride on the left side of the road and the ‘yield’ sign is replaced by ‘give way’.
